article_title: Ahead Of The Storm - News9.com - Oklahoma City, OK - News, Weather, Video and Sports
article_text:
News 9's David Payne prepares Oklahomans for the severe weather season. He'll look at the latest technology and take viewers behind the scenes.

Watch it here, or tune in to KWTV News9 Thursday night at 8:00 to see an encore presentation.
